item.title: Betty-Ann add a quote by Ram Dass
item.description: "We're all just walking each other home." -- Ram Dass

item.title: Betty-Ann add a quote by ram dass
item.description: "I would like my life to be a statement of love and compassion--and where it isn't, that's where my work lies." -- ram dass

item.title: Betty-Ann add a quote by ram dass
item.description: "Every religion is the product of the conceptual mind attempting to describe the mystery." -- ram dass

item.title: Betty-Ann add a quote by ram dass
item.description: "Healing does not mean going back to the way things were before, but rather allowing what is now to move us closer to God." -- ram dass

item.title: Betty-Ann add a quote by ram dass
item.description: "Information is just bits of data. Knowledge is putting them together. Wisdom is transcending them." -- ram dass

item.title: Betty-Ann add a quote by ram dass
item.description: "The question we need to ask ourselves is whether there is any place we can stand in ourselves where we can look at all that's happening around us without freaking out, where we can be quiet enough to hear our predicament, and where we can begin to find ways of acting that are at least not contributing to further destabilization." -- ram dass

item.title: Betty-Ann add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Creativity is intelligence having fun." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Betty-Ann add a quote by Ashleigh Brilliant
item.description: "My life has a superb cast, but I cannot figure out the plot." -- Ashleigh Brilliant
